title: BibliotecaPleyades_-_Early_2014
description:
Why download a DVD copy? It is great for offline reading!
Also, in case these wonderful websites will be taken down,
you will have all the gathered information and evidence...

================================= Torrent contains ==================================

"Main" DVD1 - almost everything from "www.bibliotecapleyades.net" website,
except two large folders:

* archivos_pdf (archived PDFs)
* imagenes_ciencia (images for scientific articles)

"Additional" DVD2 - two remaining folders above

"External" DVD3 - all the external references to pages and files of other websites

more than 130000 files were downloaded in total, many Thousands of great articles!

============================== BibliotecaPleyades_*.iso =============================

* Version           : 24 March 2014 ( Early 2014 )
* Total size        : 11.8 GB

SHA-1 Checksums:

d820e20c62d31315afe3e36e22c8fe6b4a1fe47f BibliotecaPleyades_1_Main.iso       4.48 GB
3ef7c975e5f549cbef79bf710d93ffeddc4f33d7 BibliotecaPleyades_2_Additional.iso 4.00 GB
6f3f70c15486a4b0aa5c2539ebbce268849af1ed BibliotecaPleyades_3_External.iso   3.35 GB

DVD iso file could be burned to physical discs, mounted to virtual disc drives
(with software such as WinCDEmu) or opened with archiver software (e.g. 7-Zip)

After doing that, extract all the contents of each disc to the same folder,
with merging the "www.bibliotecapleyades.net" folders of DVD1 and DVD2 discs

=====================================================================================
